mapper.select: SELECT p.pro_id, p.pro_name, p.pro_desc, p.pro_location, p.create_time, p.update_time FROM project p, student s, clazz c, discipline d, faculty f WHERE p.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND s.logic_delete_flag = 0 AND p.stu_id =.s.stu_id AND s.clazz_id = c.clazz_id AND c.disc_id = d.disc_id AND d.fac_id = f.fac_id AND p.pro_appr = 0 AND f.fac_id = #{facId}
